name: Hono Witch
description:
Light all the Lanterns to win the game.

CONTROLS

Movement: WASD

Jump/Double Jump: Spacebar

Light Lantern: Z

Dash: Left Shift

CREDITS:
Game Designer: Marcell Benevento

Lead Coder: Timothy Murphy

MC artist: Otsoga 

FX Artist: XYEzawr 

Enemy Pixel Artist: RafaelMatos 

Environmental artist: brullov  & Szadi art 

Sound Design: Sara Garrard
